algorithms.name:
B&C Performance Statistics Collection
Copyright (C) 2005, IBM Corporation and others. All Rights Reserved.
This code is licensed under the terms of the Eclipse Public License (EPL).

CbcStatistics: Captures detailed data about each branching operation.
Used for analysis and debugging of B&C search behavior.

Per-node data:
- id_/parentId_: Node identification
- depth_: Tree depth
- way_: Branch direction (-1/+1 first, -10/+10 second)
- sequence_: Variable branched on

Objective tracking:
- startingObjective_/endingObjective_: LP values
- startingInfeasibility_/endingInfeasibility_: Integer violations
- numberIterations_: LP iterations used

Useful for performance tuning and understanding B&C behavior.
